CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 28, 1950, pg. 10, reads: "Marian Bruce." Portion of accompanying article by Toki Schalk Johnson reads: "Marian Bruce, Glamour, Make Fascinating Pair - Tall, bronzed curly black-haired glamour came to Pittsburgh this week with the appearance of chanteuse Marian Bruce, the singing star of Larry Steele's vivacious, pulsating revue, now drawing the customers to Bill Green's spot on Route 51."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Marian Bruce (Logan) wearing polka dot gown and holding cigarette
